channel.title: Character modeling and UV mapping
channel.description:
I have been deciding what program to switch to, im leaning more towards Maya. I cannot switch right now because i have school, which means if i want to create something it will take me 2+ hours when in c4d it would be a fraction of the time.
Till then, i tried modeling a game appropriate character. I used unfold3d to flatten out the polygons and i used C4D to align them with the textures. Textures are NOT mine, i used a texture sheet from call of duty 4. Why? Google sucked with finding good reference images and Infinity ward had photo shoots for textures, which obv i cannot do.
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/771/newhands.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/5058/marineg.png[/img]
[img]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/6384/marinew.png[/img]
4126 tris.
